## FileContainer.set() method

Set a value.

Signature:

```typescript
set(key: string, value: any): this;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |
| value     | any    |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
fsInstance.set("some/file.js", "/absolute/path/to/some/file.js");
```
